name: Pandemic Simulation
description:
Pandemic Simulation shows how quickly a virus like Covid-19 can spread when neccesary precautions are not taken!

Covid-19 has been in our lives for several months and we are ready to move on!

Although unfortunately,  Covid-19 is not ready to move on. With states in the US opening back up, we are starting to see numbers rise again. 

Hopefully this game will put into perspective how easily a virus can spread among us, and can help show you how important preventative measures are.
